name: places/ChIJg-yOhlJZwokRyf3ttqiS0jo
adrFormatAddress: 693 5th Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
Dr Armen is a talented, caring, world class dentist. He gave me a total smile makeover: every tooth in my mouth veneered or crowned. I wanted big teeth so he built up my molars to fit more teeth in my mouth while maintaining a healthy bite. He used 3 or 4 different types or carbon paper to perfectly and precisely adjust my bite each time. He even took me to W Veneer down the block (the best lab in NYC they use) and had the ceramists build a ledge on some front teeth to make my lips pop more and look bigger!!

Everyone noticed I looked more beautiful after. Some people even asked if I had my nose or lips done. I’m so glad I was able to accomplish this new improved look through only my teeth. His office also has a zero tolerance policy for pain. So whatever you need to not feel a thing, they’ll make that happen. You’ll never dread going to the dentist again! It’s always a pleasure with Dr. Armen and you’ll be so happy with the results! Good luck on your smile journey, and thank you so much, Dr. Armen and team!

originalText.text:
Came in for a cleaning,  xray and general checkup. Super thorough and efficient experience. Had time to also help me explore smile makeover options such as veneers. Showed me a quick mockup using resin. Was thoughtful and proposed me other referrals to alternatives such as braces / Invisalign from orthodontist- didn’t feel pressured to make decision right away.

Will come back for sure - great central area for those who need to pop in for dental work

originalText.text: Dr. Armen will change your perspective about dentistry. My experience was so pleasant I didn't want to leave the office! He was kind, efficient, and gentle while working on my teeth - it was completely painless... I returned to work immediately after my procedure was done. 10/10 recommend Dr. Armen - he will surpass any and all expectations one might have about going to the dentist. Thank you, Dr. Armen!

He was kind, efficient, and gentle while working on my teeth - it was completely painless... I returned to work immediately after my procedure was done. 10/10 recommend Dr. Armen - he will surpass any and all expectations one might have about going to the dentist. Thank you, Dr. Armen!

originalText.text:
I had an amazing experience with Dr. Armen. I would highly recommend him for anyone who is looking for a smile makeover. Dr. Armen is very professional and friendly.

I had always struggled with my smile because I had an implant that didn’t match the rest of my teeth. I had lost my front tooth as a child. Dr. Armen replaced the implant and gave me custom veneers that look so natural. People are constantly stopping me mid sentence to tell me that I have a beautiful smile. I could not recommend Dr. Armen enough. His work is absolutely amazing and it was a pleasure to visit the office. Thank you Dr. Armen.

originalText.text:
I am delighted to provide this testimonial for Dr. Armen Akopian, who so diligently offered his professional services for a set of eight veneers and some composite bonding for me.

Words cannot describe the impeccable quality of his skills and expertise. Time and again, he always double and triple checked to make sure that his work was of the highest satisfaction and comfort, always going above and beyond in his care.

Aside from his calming and comforting personality, the gift of a perfect smile that he gave me is truly beyond any possible description. But all of this pales in comparison to the loving gifts of kindness and warmth that he shares with his patients.

In addition to being an exceptional dentist, he is also a wonderful person, and one would be hard-pressed to find anything for him to improve upon. The work of his hands has surpassed my every expectation, and I am happy to recommend his services wholeheartedly to anyone without the slightest bit of hesitation.
